Text: PPP! This is a great album. Everybody into good music, check it out. /J

yeah, this is really a great album ...... and as someone who works at ppp's distributor allow me to add: this album is also available on cd and double-vinyl ... "Wow!!!! I listened to this album 7 times in a row & then called 23 friends to make them listen to it!"

Great album...small gripe; thought the recording was a little low
